1.0.name: wordpress/shopp-clockwork
1.0.description:
This plugin integrates Shopp with Clockwork.

This plugin adds text message notifications for new orders.

After checkout, the merchant will receive a text message with new order information.

This process occurs in the background without needing action from the customer.

Recommendations

  • Need help with your Shopp ecommerce store? Hire a Shopp developer today.
  • Check out our latest project: Web-based training for Shopp
  • View additional WordPress plugins for Shopp by Lorenzo Orlando Caum, Enzo12 LLC
